mistral.reason: Makhdoom Bilawal, being a Sufi saint and philosopher, was associated with Islam but veneration in Islam is not specific to individuals as it encompasses all followers of the faith. However, he is highly revered within the Sindhi community and considered as one of the greatest figures of Sindhi culture and literature.
